text: Which framework is the most friendly for shared hosting environment?
I am currently comparing available web frameworks to be used for my next projects.
The only criterion I need are speed and portability, i.e shared hosting friendly.
I have tried Ruby on Rails, but its speed/performance is not good enough for me.
I am interested in Django, but I think it is not that friendly on shared hosting - correct me if I am wrong.
I have also taken a look at Yii and it seems promising, but I am more interested in framework based on other than PHP.
Do you have any suggestion for what framework should be used given that criterion?
